Articles.Content:
YF-12A

This is the only replica that survived to 1.0

Full stock 222 parts

I had to clip 2 more engines to make it fly actually fast, has tons of fuel about 1400 up to 2400, enough to a long mach 3 test fly.

It handles ok for such a big plane, is one the most stable plane you could ever try, but still not an aerobatic plane.

Without kerbpaint

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/H5ued)

with kerbpaint

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/uctB6)

real plane size:

-length 30.97m

-width 16.95m

-height 5.64m

my replica size:

-length 29m

-width 16.5m

-height 5m

Performance:

-manouverability good

-speed mach 1 at sea level, mach 3.5 at 12 km altitude 

CONTROLS

-1 toggle engines

-3 toggle missile bay (no missiles added in this version)

http://www./download/jt4qbylk8v33084/YF-12A__By_Eorin_1_0.craft

DOWNLOAD

attention

If you want the coloured version (kerbpaint) then check this link [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-%28September-23rd%29-%28Same-Old-Still-Works!%29?p=1903103&posted=1#post1903103](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50008-0-23-KerbPaint-Paint-layering-for-parts-%28September-23rd%29-%28Same-Old-Still-Works!%29?p=1903103&posted=1#post1903103) here you can find an updated version of kerbpaint with some of the new parts from 1.0

![zVi3sWF.png](http://i.imgur.com/zVi3sWF.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T20:51:46Z" title="05/04/2015 08:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by eorin**

I'm upvoating this before the start troll arrives. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Also, it seems some of my older craft have also survived, including my strela-10 and some fighters.

Speaking of which... are you interested in a collaborative replica project? It could be fun... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I'm upvoating this before the start troll arrives. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Also, it seems some of my older craft have also survived, including my strela-10 and some fighters.
> 
> Speaking of which... are you interested in a collaborative replica project? It could be fun... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Why not ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I'm still learning how the new aerodinamic model works... I think now precise replicas are dead (especially stealth) except for sleek planes like blackbird, mig 21,sukhoi 27-35 and american planes like F-15,F-16 and R.I.P. planes like F-22, PAK-fa, YF-23, F-35. 

It's almost impossible now reproduce a fuselage using only wings connectors without compromise the lift.

> 
> Why not ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I'm still learning how the new aerodinamic model works... I think now precise replicas are dead (especially stealth) except for sleek planes like blackbird, mig 21,sukhoi 27-35 and american planes like F-15,F-16 and R.I.P. planes like F-22, PAK-fa, YF-23, F-35. 
> It's almost impossible now reproduce a fuselage using only wings connectors without compromise the lift.

It does seem F-16 esque jets faired better than most. My TA-50 now looks rather ugly, but it has a tight turning circle and a high top speed.

Designing jets closer to bullets works better.

![wX56E3Jl.png](http://i.imgur.com/wX56E3Jl.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T12:38:21Z" title="04/28/2015 12:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by andrew123**

I think now precise replicas are dead (especially stealth) except for sleek planes like blackbird, mig 21,sukhoi 27-35 and american planes like F-15,F-16 and R.I.P. planes like F-22, PAK-fa, YF-23, F-35. 
> It's almost impossible now reproduce a fuselage using only wings connectors without compromise the lift.

that sound as a challenge good sir.......F22 it is

> 
> It does seem F-16 esque jets faired better than most. My TA-50 now looks rather ugly, but it has a tight turning circle and a high top speed.
> Designing jets closer to bullets works better.
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/wX56E3Jl.png](http://i.imgur.com/wX56E3Jl.png)

If you need more help, count me in! I've got an F-16 which I need to update. PM me if you want the link!

> 
> If you need more help, count me in! I've got an F-16 which I need to update. PM me if you want the link!

Actually, I could update that for you. It'll be an overhaul mission. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What do you think of taking over control of KATEC? I personally don't have too much time to play or manage ksp related stuff atm. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> that sound as a challenge good sir.......F22 it is

You know how much good my old F-22 was, i will consider mediocre anithing that is not looking similar...

Me? I'm honored! I can't start right now- SATs- but I can try.

P.S. Your inbox is full.

> 
> You know how much good my old F-22 was, i will consider mediocre anithing that is not looking similar...

hahaha okay
UPDATE: increased roll rate and a little modification on rudders.

UPDATE! lowest part count from 258 to 222, lighter than before and a bit more manouverable, now the files come coloured with kerbpaint (if you dont have it it's not a problem the craft will automatically work with stock colour). Ceck the OP for download and new parts kerbpaint download.

UPDATE: now the shape of the fron is even more accurate, you can see what i mean here

![Op6WvdA.png](http://i.imgur.com/Op6WvdA.png)
